title: What is the next generation of Creative Cloud? - Quora

response.answer_text: More expensive, more bugs, more unstable, more bloated, more intrusive, and less control for the user. Unless the competition improves enough to cause a sea change that sends users to another competing product, as happened with QuarkXPress. This is the evolutionary path of most software, especially that produced by de facto monopolies.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Alex S. Gabor
